abstract: Pennsylvania grand jury recommends Attorney General Kathleen G Kane be charged with perjury and other crimes in regards to her office's disclosure of details about secret probe of Philadelphia civil rights leader J Whyatt Mondesire.
lead_paragraph: A state grand jury has recommended that Kathleen G. Kane be charged with perjury and other crimes in connection with her office’s disclosure of details about the secret investigation of a Philadelphia civil rights leader.

byline.original: By JON HURDLE and TIMOTHY WILLIAMS

snippet: A state grand jury has recommended that Kathleen G. Kane be charged with perjury and other crimes in connection with her office’s disclosure of details about the secret investigation of a Philadelphia civil rights leader.

headline.main: Grand Jury Recommends Pennsylvania Attorney General Be Charged With Perjury
headline.print_headline: Grand Jury Recommends Pennsylvania Attorney General Be Charged With Perjury
